title: Clutch.co Agencies Scraper
description: Scrape agency listings from Clutch.co. Provide category/location or a Clutch.co search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes profile pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Clutch.co search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Category/Location.

collectDetails.title: Collect agency details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens agency profile pages for full details.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of agencies
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of agencies to collect. Leave empty to collect all available agencies.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (datacenter recommended for Clutch.co).

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate agency URLs from results (in-memory deduplication).
